description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nPowerful Draw:
This creature can only equip Arrow spells, but they can be from any class. This creature's single-target Arrow spells deal additional damage equal to 50% of its {STAT_attack}. This creature's [icons,1976]Splitting Arrow and [icons,1976]Fragmenting Arrow spells deal 100% more damage.
name: Composite Longbow
